executive_summary.vision: To simplify the job application process with AI-powered tools that create ATS-optimized resumes and cover letters, increasing job seekers' chances of landing interviews, while providing a professional portfolio showcase to highlight their work.
executive_summary.mission: Landed.io helps job seekers overcome application barriers by providing intelligent, personalized resume and cover letter creation tools that adapt to specific job requirements and ATS systems, complemented by customizable portfolio pages that showcase their professional work and projects.
goals: Increase job seekers' interview conversion rates by at least 40% through ATS-optimized document creation
Provide an intuitive, streamlined experience that reduces job application time by 75%
Enable professionals to showcase their work through personalized portfolio pages with custom URLs
Build a sustainable business through a freemium model with clear value proposition for premium features

market_size.resume_builder_market: The global resume builder market is valued at approximately $7.23-8.29 billion in 2024, with projections showing continued growth to $10.6-11.95 billion by 2029-2032.
market_size.ai_powered_segment: The AI-powered resume builder segment is valued at approximately $400 million to $1.42 billion in 2024, projected to reach $1.8-7.12 billion by 2032-2033, growing at a CAGR of 18.7-20%.
market_size.ats_optimization_services: Resume optimization services focusing specifically on ATS compatibility are valued at approximately $0.35 billion in 2024, expected to reach $1.16 billion by 2033.

market_trends: Integration of AI and machine learning for personalized document creation
Increased focus on ATS compatibility as a standard feature
Rising importance of mobile and cloud-based platforms
Growing demand for comprehensive job application management tools
Emphasis on personal branding and skills presentation
Integration of portfolio showcases with job application tools for creative professionals

pain_points: 75% of qualified resumes are rejected by ATS before human review
Each corporate job posting attracts approximately 250 resumes on average
Only about 2% of resumes are successful in securing an interview
Job seekers need to send 50-100 resumes on average to secure a new role
Complex resume formats with graphics or unusual fonts often confuse ATS systems
60% of job seekers abandon applications that take longer than 20 minutes to complete
Many receive automated rejections within hours, suggesting limited human review

risks_and_mitigations.risk: Low conversion rate from free to paid users
risks_and_mitigations.mitigation: Clearly demonstrate value of premium features, implement strategic conversion points, A/B test pricing and features
Extensive testing with different job types, human review process during beta, continuous improvement based on feedback
Regular research on ATS trends, partnerships with HR technology experts, rapid updates to optimization engine
Focus on differentiators (cover letter + resume integration, superior AI, portfolio integration), competitive pricing, unique user experience

risks_and_mitigations.risk: Technical issues with document export quality
risks_and_mitigations.mitigation: Extensive testing across devices and browsers, multiple export options, clear documentation for users

risks_and_mitigations.risk: Storage and bandwidth costs for portfolio file hosting
risks_and_mitigations.mitigation: Implement file size limits, image compression, tiered storage limits based on subscription level

risks_and_mitigations.risk: Portfolio feature adding complexity to user experience
risks_and_mitigations.mitigation: Clear UX separation between resume/cover letter tools and portfolio features, progressive disclosure of features
Focus on seamless integration between resume and portfolio features, emphasize convenience of all-in-one platform
